pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with Prime Minister Shinzo Abe of Japan | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Trudeau met today with Prime Minister Shinzo Abe of Japan on the margins of the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation Leaders Meeting.

The two leaders discussed their mutual interest to deepen regional cooperation in the Asia-Pacific region based on open and progressive trade.

They also exchanged views on North Korea. Finally, both leaders reaffirmed their interest to deepen bilateral cooperation on peace and security.
